src:
愷樂爆炸上圍差點撐破緊身背心　粉絲狂喊：姐穿這樣太扯
07 Nov 2019, 04:32 by 張詠淇
愷樂自從轉型成性感辣妹後，經常公開大曬好身材，6日她在IG上PO出表演照，穿著緊身背心及超短熱褲在舞台上演出，爆炸的上圍快把背心撐破，隱約露出雪白雙峰，連黑色底褲也從邊邊露出，讓粉絲直噴鼻血。
愷樂穿著黑色緊身背心，身材曲線前凸後翹，一眼就看到她的雄偉上圍，臀部的飽滿線條也一覽無遺，照片曝光後，引起粉絲直呼說，「這樣不行啦！！！喂～簡爸爸」、「姐穿這樣太扯」。愷樂過去曾分享過養胸秘訣，從小就會吃豬腳和青木瓜的習慣，還會用「胸膜」美胸，穿對內衣對胸部形狀也很重要，而且一定要把副乳撥到正確位置才不會下垂。
為了維持好身材，愷樂還有自己的減重食譜，「早餐通常是無糖豆漿、飯糰，中午吃攝影棚便當，晚餐只吃青菜和蛋白質，宵夜則會吃蘋果或優酪乳。
更新時間｜2019.11.07 04:40
text:
On the top of the 恺 爆 explosion, I almost broke through the tight vest. Fans yelled: Sister wears this too.
07 Nov 2019, 04:32 by Zhang Yiqi
Since the transformation into a sexy hot girl, she has always been open to the public. On the 6th, she performed a photo on the IG, wearing a tight vest and ultra-short hot pants on the stage. The blasted vest quickly broke the vest. Vaguely revealing the snow-white double peaks, even the black underwear is exposed from the side, let the fans directly nosebleed.
Yan Le was wearing a black tight-fitting vest. The figure was convex and slanted, and she saw her majestic upper circumference at a glance. The full line of the buttocks was also unobstructed. After the photo was exposed, the fans shouted, "This is not ok!!! ~ Jane Dad, "Sister is so too worn." In the past, I have shared the secret of breast-raising. I have used the habit of pig's feet and green papaya since I was a child. I also use the "pleura" breast. Wearing underwear is also important for the shape of the chest, and I must dial the right breast. The position will not sag.
In order to maintain a good body, Yule also has his own weight loss recipe. "Breakfast is usually sugar-free soy milk, rice balls, lunch at lunchtime, dinner with greens and protein, and apple or yogurt at night.
Update time|2019.11.07 04:40
